discussion_comments.comment_body:
_⚠️ Potential issue_

**Review removal of ClamAV dependency**  
Commenting out the ClamAV service and its reference may disable file scanning for uploads. Confirm that an alternative antivirus solution is in place or update related logic to avoid unscanned files in production.

<details>
<summary>🤖 Prompt for AI Agents</summary>

```
In docker-compose.yml at line 67, the ClamAV service is commented out, which
disables file scanning for uploads. Verify if there is an alternative antivirus
solution configured; if not, either reinstate ClamAV or implement another
scanning mechanism. Additionally, update any related application logic to handle
the absence of ClamAV to ensure files are scanned before processing in
production.
```

</details>
